sentence.Network_en: Such measures would be highly impracticable and almost impossible to apply.
sentence.Network_cn: 这样的措施非常不切实际，几乎不可能付诸实施。

sentence.Network_en: It would be impracticable for each member to be consulted on every occasion.
sentence.Network_cn: 不可能每一次都征求每个成员的意见。

sentence.Network_en: The damage it would cause makes the idea utterly impracticable.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个想法可能造成损害,以致根本不能采纳.

list.abs: The Ascoli game was strange , on an impracticable pitch ., 与阿斯科利的比赛很奇怪 , 在一个不可行的场地进行.

entry.def: If something such as a course of action is impracticable, it is impossible to do.

example.ex: Such measures would be highly impracticable and almost impossible to apply.
example.tran: 这样的措施非常不切实际,几乎不可能付诸实施。

means.word_mean: 1. not capable of being carried out or put into practice;

sentences.sentence: "refloating the sunken ship proved impracticable because of its fragility"
"a suggested reform that was unfeasible in the prevailing circumstances"

auth_sentence.content: Budding engineers who bombarded the Company with impracticable schemes.
auth_sentence.res_content: Budding engineers who bombarded the Company with impracticable schemes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Budding engineers who bombarded the Company with impracticable schemes.

auth_sentence.content: In the end the scheme was abandoned as impracticable.
auth_sentence.res_content: In the end the scheme was abandoned as impracticable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In the end the scheme was abandoned as impracticable.

auth_sentence.content: It is impracticable to control their unruly passions.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is impracticable to control their unruly passions.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is impracticable to control their unruly passions.

sentences.en: The scheme was criticized as too idealistic and impracticable.
sentences.cn: 人们批评这个方案太理想化,行不通。

sentences.en: The damage it would cause makes the idea utterly impracticable.
sentences.cn: 这个想法可能造成损害，以致根本不能采纳。
